_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:46:09 using v2.1
title: Does feeling supported to manage their long-term condition(s) differ by deprivation?
analysis_commentary:
Information published under the NHS Outcomes Framework also indicates a link between how people feel about being supported and levels of deprivation.

The least deprived patient group felt supported to manage their long-term condition(s) the most (69% in 2013) and the most deprived patient group felt the least supported to manage their long-term condition(s), with a strong correlation between feeling positive about the support received and patient deprivation.
